name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 1 a.m. on December 10, a fire broke out in Niujie, Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, a knife attack occurred on Guangzhou Metro Line 9. A man tried to stab another man with a knife, but he resisted. There was a pool of blood on the ground. A little boy, who was a few years old, shouted "Stop fighting, help me" on the train. He should be the son of the male passenger who was stabbed. Then the station attendant got on the train to stop him and took the boy away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, Rainie Yang joked at her concert in Zhengzhou that "Henan people love to lie", which angered netizens. She then made a formal apology on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师

content:

December 9, in a place in Jiangsu. Traffic police hid behind the car and secretly observed the electric bikes coming from the opposite direction. When they found someone without a helmet, the traffic police would suddenly jump out to stop the vehicle, and another traffic police would be responsible for issuing tickets on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
December 9, Heyuan City, Guangdong. A mother posted a video saying that her child "Jiazhu" was born on August 26, 2010, and disappeared on September 26, 2015. Now she is in the late stage of lung cancer and the cancer cells have spread to the brain. I am afraid that I don't have much time left. I hope my child can come home soon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the topic of "Zhang Xuefeng said that liberal arts are all service industries" has sparked heated discussions among netizens. Zhang Xuefeng, a famous online celebrity and postgraduate entrance examination teacher, said: All liberal arts are service industries, which can be summed up as "licking". On December 9, Zhang Xuefeng posted two consecutive Weibo posts to apologize, and then apologized in a sarcastic way during the live broadcast, saying "the service industry is the highest level."

December 8, Shenyang, Liaoning. An old man wanted to tear down the national flag in the subway, but the young man in white scolded him and stopped him loudly: Let me ask you, what are you going to do? "

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
It is said that a netizen posted on WeChat Moments that he would COS "Blood Groove Sister" on Halloween in Shanghai next year, and was subsequently blocked from WeChat Moments for two days.
I don't know which one is more illegal, "Shanghai Halloween" or "Blood Groove Sister".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 10, Liuzhou, Guangxi. The sales office of Luzhai Times City was deserted during the handover period, and the owners put up banners on the roof to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On December 8, Zalantun City, Inner Mongolia. Mr. Gong was driving at night when he saw a drunk man lying in the middle of the road. He then helped the drunk man back to the house.
According to Mr. Gong, the next day, the man came to him and asked him to delete the video, otherwise he would sue him if it affected his career. Mr. Gong said that despite this, he did not regret saving the man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, a dustproof color steel shed collapsed at Jinyuan Building Materials Factory in Malin Street, Xishui County, Guizhou Province. As of 17:00 on the 9th, the accident caused 6 deaths and 3 injuries. The injured are currently receiving treatment in the hospital, and the aftermath and investigation of the accident are underway.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 8, a child fell into a bread mixer in the supermarket's workshop at the Damai Supermarket in Dongguan, Guangdong. 
On December 9, a staff member of the emergency department of a hospital near the supermarket said that the child had multiple fractures and had died. The staff of the supermarket involved said that the relevant area of the supermarket had been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 9, Leshan City, Sichuan Province.
It was reported online that two 19-year-old boys robbed a child on the street and were then beaten by citizens. From the video, one of the boys fell to the ground unconscious with blood at the corner of his mouth, and the other boy was pressed to the ground and kept crying, "Stop beating me." 
That night, a reporter learned from the Shizhong District Branch of the Leshan County Public Security Bureau that it was actually two men who were drunk and causing trouble, and there was no child robbery. 
At the same time, according to an insider, the two men were drunk and teasing children in the community, and were mistakenly thought to be robbing children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
December 9, Guangdong. A man saw two homeless children on the street. The kind-hearted man then gave some food to the children and called the police.
After the police questioned them, they learned that the children's mother had died a long time ago, their father had not been seen for more than half a month, and their grandparents were also gone.
The video has now disappeared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 9, a netizen posted a video saying that a China Eastern Airlines flight MU533 from Shanghai to London returned to Shanghai. The video showed that it was suspected that the aircraft was dumping fuel in the air to reduce weight.
China Eastern Airlines staff said that the aircraft had returned and was under maintenance, and the subsequent reasons would be further notified. The flight took off again after changing the passenger plane.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
According to the notice of the Supreme Court, the National Court Judgment Documents Database will be launched in January 2024.
In recent years, the China Judgment Documents Network has continuously removed judgment documents. Practitioners are generally worried that after the Judgment Documents Network is unfinished or offline, it will be replaced by the "National Court Judgment Documents Database" within the court.
At that time, future judgment documents may only be made public within the court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, a female senior student at Langfang No. 1 Middle School, who had previously suffered from depression, hanged herself due to trauma at school. Her parents held banners at the school gate to protest for their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 9, the 7th China-International Organ Donation Conference opened in Nanning, Guangxi. It is reported that for seven consecutive years, my country's annual body organ donation and organ transplantation have ranked second in the world and first in Asia. Facts have proved that the path of organ donation and transplantation development is in line with national conditions and has withstood the test of practice. my country has explored a path of human organ donation that not only follows the guidelines of the World Health Organization, but also conforms to China's national conditions and culture, with the participation of the Red Cross, and has distinct Chinese characteristics. It has been recognized by the international community. 
So far, more than 49,000 donations have been completed, more than 150,000 organs have been donated, and the cumulative number of voluntary registrations has exceeded 6.55 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 10, the Student Union of the Experimental Middle School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University released a public tweet about the club representative conference. Classmates found out that there were a large number of similar faces in the picture, and it was suspected that they were photoshopped. It is suspected that because there were too few participants, classmates mocked it as a "clone representative conference" and "there might be a Blade Runner coming."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, in Qingdao, a deliveryman was stopped by the police when he went to offer flowers. The deliverymen around him said, "This is food, not flowers." Then everyone shouted, "Rest in peace, brother."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, on December 10, some people wanted to buy chrysanthemums to send to the scene to mourn, but were stopped by the police at the door.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, International Human Rights Day, the EU Delegation to China published a long article on its official Weibo account, urging China to unconditionally release: Pastor Cao Sanqiang, Chang Weiping, Chen Yunfei, Cheng Yuan, Ding Jiaxi, Gao Zhisheng, Go Sherab Gyatso, Guo Quan, He Fangmei, Huang Qi, Huang Xueqin, Sakharov Prize winner Ilham Tohti, Kamile Wayit, Li Qiaochu, Li Yanhe, Li Yuhan, Peng Lifa, Qin Yongmin, Qin Yongpei, Rinchen Tsultrim, Ruan Xiaohuan, Tashi Dorje, Tashpolat Tiyip
Tiyip), Wang Aizhong, Wang Bingzhang, Wang Jianbing, Pastor Wang Yi, Wang Zang, Xu Na, Xu Qin, Xu Yan, Xu Zhiyong, Yang Maodong, Pastor Zhang Chunlei, Zhang Zhanhe and EU citizen Gui Minhai (whose right of consular access must be respected).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, the voter turnout rate for the Hong Kong District Council election was only 24.5%. 
This is a drop of nearly 60% from 63.65% in the same period of 2019.
